Text:
This is the Asian Version of Resident Evil 4 (in other words Biohazard 4) It would have been better if the uploader had mentioned this in the description. For those who want the European version, Download this one here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6070718/Resident_Evil_4_1.1.0_with_Enhanced_Texture_Patch_2.0
